targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as yellow_Cost 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as purple_Cost
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as yellow_Cost 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as purple_Cost
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple'

select 
ps.date as "time" ,
ps.Totalcosts as purple_Cost
from (SELECT *
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple') ps 
 inner join
 (SELECT * 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow') ys 
 
 on ps.date =ys.date

select 
ps.date as "time" ,
ys.Totalcosts as yellow_Cost 
from (SELECT *
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple') ps 
 inner join
 (SELECT * 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow') ys 
 
 on ps.date =ys.date

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as yellow_Cost 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as purple_Cost
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple'

select 
CAST(ps.date AS TEXT),
ps.CapabilitiesService as purple_CapabilitiesService,
ys.CapabilitiesService as yellow_CapabilitiesService 
from (SELECT *
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple') ps 
 inner join
 (SELECT * 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow') ys  
 on ps.date =ys.date;

select 
  CAST(date AS TEXT),
 CapabilitiesService 
 FROM
  py_servcie
  where
 source = 'yellow'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as yellow_Cost 
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'yellow'

SELECT 
 date as "time" ,
Totalcosts as purple_Cost
FROM
  py_servcie
where
 source = 'purple'

select 
 CAST(date AS TEXT),
 CapabilitiesService,
 Icapabilities,
 APIService,
 UIService
 
 FROM
  py_servcie
  where
 source = 'yellow'

select 
  CAST(date AS TEXT),
 CapabilitiesService 
 FROM
  py_servcie
  where
 source = 'yellow'

select 
DATE_PART('Year', date) AS yearWise,
sum(CapabilitiesService) as sum,
avg(CapabilitiesService) as avg,
min(CapabilitiesService) as min,
max(CapabilitiesService) as max

FROM
  py_servcie
  where
 source = 'yellow'
 GROUP BY DATE_PART('Year', date);

select 
CAST(ps.date AS TEXT),
ps.Totalcosts as Purple,
ys.Totalcosts as Yellow
from (
select
  date,
  Totalcosts
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'yellow'
) ys 
inner join 

(
select
  date,
  Totalcosts
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'purple'
) ps
on ps.date=ys.date
Order 
 by ps.date desc
Limit 2

select 
ps.yearWise as yr,
ps.cp as purple_cp,
ys.cp as yellow_cp
from (
select
  DATE_PART('Year', date) AS yearWise,
  sum(CapabilitiesService) as cp
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'yellow'
GROUP BY
  DATE_PART('Year', date)
) ys 
inner join 

(
select
  DATE_PART('Year', date) AS yearWise,
  sum(CapabilitiesService) as cp
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'purple'
GROUP BY
  DATE_PART('Year', date)
) ps
on ys.yearWise=ps.yearWise

select 
  CAST(date AS TEXT),
 CapabilitiesService 
 FROM
  py_servcie
  where
 source = 'yellow'

select
  date  as "time",
  CapabilitiesService,
  Icapabilities,
  APIService,
  ExAPIService,
	PerformancesService,
	BCapabilitiesService,
	CCTVService,
	Totalcosts,
	IcapabilitiesService,
	NetService,
	AppService,
	YieldService
	
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'yellow'
Order 
 by date desc
Limit 2

select 
CAST(ps.date AS TEXT),
ps.CapabilitiesService as purple_CapabilitiesService,
ys.CapabilitiesService as yellow_CapabilitiesService
from (
select
  date,
  CapabilitiesService
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'yellow'
) ys 
inner join 

(
select
  date,
  CapabilitiesService
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'purple'
) ps
on ps.date=ys.date

select
  date  as "time",
  CapabilitiesService,
  Icapabilities,
  APIService,
  ExAPIService,
	PerformancesService,
	BCapabilitiesService,
	CCTVService,
	Totalcosts,
	IcapabilitiesService,
	NetService,
	AppService,
	YieldService
	
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'purple'
Order 
 by date desc
Limit 2

select 
CAST(ps.date AS TEXT),
ps.Totalcosts as Purple,
ys.Totalcosts as Yellow
from (
select
  date,
  Totalcosts
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'yellow'
) ys 
inner join 

(
select
  date,
  Totalcosts
FROM
  py_servcie
where
  source = 'purple'
) ps
on ps.date=ys.date
Order 
 by ps.date desc
Limit 2
